events.message: The customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on a busy road resulting in significant damage to the car, prompting the initial claim submission.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under 'Auto Accident' based on the description of the car accident and collision details provided.
An insurance agent was assigned to the case to provide personalized assistance and manage the claim process for the vehicle accident.
The customer received formal acknowledgment of their claim, assuring them that the process has been officially initiated and support is available.
The agent requested necessary documents including the police report, photos of the accident, and the vehicle damage assessment to proceed with the investigation.
The customer successfully submitted all required documentation, including detailed photos and official accident reports needed for further claim processing.
The investigation team began a thorough review of the accident circumstances, vehicle damage, and submitted documents to validate the claim details.
Investigation concluded with confirmation of the collision facts and verification of damage, supporting the customerâ€™s claim for coverage.
A settlement offer was prepared based on the damage assessment and insurance policy terms, providing compensation details to the claimant.
The customer provided positive feedback regarding the communication and timely handling of the claim process after reviewing the proposed settlement.
The claim was officially approved by the insurance company, confirming that the customer will receive compensation for the auto accident damages.
Payment was issued to the policyholder to cover the repair costs as per the approved settlement agreement finalized after the investigation.
The claim case was officially closed after disbursing payment and confirming with the customer that all processes were satisfactorily completed.
